trial_type.Description: Whether the Probe word was in a List for this trial, the previous trial, or no List. (TrialType in eprime output).

Levels.NP: Novel Positive (Probe was a member of this trial's List); correct response is button 1.
Levels.NN: Novel Negative (Probe not a member of any List); correct response is button 2. Low cognitive control demands.
Levels.RN: Recent Negative (Probe a member of previous trial's List); correct response is button 2. High cognitive control demands.

trial_length.Description: Total number of words presented in the Lists for this trial. (ListLen in eprime output).

response_time.Description: Time between appearance of Probe word and the button press (ProbeSlide.RT in eprime output).

response_button.Description: Whether the button under the first or second finger of the right hand was pressed. (ProbeSlide.RESP in eprime output).

response_accuracy.Description: If the response was correct. (ProbeSlide.ACC in eprime output).
